things.description: A beautiful and tranquil sleepy town on the edge of Maine, at the foot of the great Cadillac Mountain in Acadia National Park.
An amazing borough of NYC, filled with great creativity and energy.
My hometown, filled with great people, parks, and food.
A historic small town with a gorgeous racetrack and wonderful spots.
A great European city with fantastic food, a great beach, and lots of great architecture.
